paper_title.en: Foundation of Practice Lesson for Promotion of Creativity in Curricula for Teacher Training in Technology Education
paper_title.ja: 中等技術科教員養成課程における創造性育成のための実習授業の創設

description.ja: 学校教育において「中等技術科」を担当する教員にとっては，教員自身が経験したものづくりの意義や楽しさを生徒たちに伝えることがより重要であると考えられる。そこで，産業技術科学科に設置されている様々な領域の講義や実習で獲得した知識と経験を総合的に応用して，課題解決において実践する能力を養成するために，「創造技術実習」という必修授業を新しく平成10年度に開講した。本報告では，必修としたねらいと開講するまでの経過を述べるとともに，授業の成果について検討し，今後の本授業の在り方および指導内容・方法について考察を加えた。In school education, it is important for teacher training in technology education that a teacher indicates the meaning and the pleasure of creation which he has experienced. Therefore, a newcompulsory teaching subject has been established in department of Industrial Arts Education, to allow for the pritical application of knowledge and experience gained in lecture and practice in a variety of fields. In this study, the purpose of compulsion, the process to opening and the results of the lessons are described. Furthermore, we consider what the lesson should be, and propose teaching content and the method.

paper_title.en: A Simulation Model to Study an Adaptive Behavior of Fish School under the Dead-loked Status
paper_title.ja: A Simulation Model to Study an Adaptive Behavior of Fish School under the Dead-loked Status
魚群行動モデルにおける協調行動の創発
paper_title.en: Emergence of Cooperation in Fish Behavior Models

description.ja: A fish school is considered as a typical example of autonomous decentralized system existing in nature, because it often shows a high degree of cooperation in the absence of a leader. In this paper simulation and analysis of the behavior of a fish school are made for the case where the school is affected by a trap. A specific order of the school is established based on the environmental effect and the information exchange among the school members. The relationship between the order of the school and the quantity of the information exchange is investigated by using two fish behavior models; a homogeneous cooperative school model and a heterogeneous repulsive school model. The different moving patterns are found as the simulation results by changing the quantity of information exchange for two types of fish bahavior models. It is also found that the emergence condition of cooperation is related to the system diversity.
description.en: A fish school is considered as a typical example of autonomous decentralized system existing in nature, because it often shows a high degree of cooperation in the absence of a leader. In this paper simulation and analysis of the behavior of a fish school are made for the case where the school is affected by a trap. A specific order of the school is established based on the environmental effect and the information exchange among the school members. The relationship between the order of the school and the quantity of the information exchange is investigated by using two fish behavior models; a homogeneous cooperative school model and a heterogeneous repulsive school model. The different moving patterns are found as the simulation results by changing the quantity of information exchange for two types of fish bahavior models. It is also found that the emergence condition of cooperation is related to the system diversity.

paper_title.en: A Prediction for Fish Behavior by Using Multi-Layer Neural Network
paper_title.ja: 階層型ニューラルネットワークを用いた魚群行動の予測

description.ja: 近年，"自律分散システム"と呼ばれる概念がシステム工学の分野で注目されている。このシステムには集中管理を行うオブザーバが存在しないことから，対故障性，柔軟性に優れているといわれている。一方，魚群行動は自律分散システムの典型的な例であると考えられる。これまでに著者らは，"自律分散システム"の考え方を導入し，水槽内の魚群行動を記述する物理モデルを提案した。本研究では，このモデルをさらに発展させ，魚群内の各個体が周囲の環境を認識して自律的に行動を決定するようなモデルの構築を試みる。このことにより，自律分散システムが成立するために各構成要素がもたなければならない機能について考察する。本論文では，まず研究の一段階として，従来の物理モデルでは表現しにくい行動パターンの例をとりあげ，その時間的挙動を予測する問題を考察する。そのための予測モデルを学習能力をもったニューラルネットワークを用いて構築する。It is known that various patterns of fish behavior are obtained according to different environments around the school. It was shown by a water tank experiment that the schooling behavior contains various states, e.g. 'moving' and 'stopping'. In this paper, the neural network model is proposed to predict such a behavior of fish school. The model is represented by Elman Neural Network with three layers. It is found that the model is valid, if we choose the learning data suitably. The behavior of fish school is considered as an autonomous decentralized system. Therefore, we expect the mechanism of the autonomous decentralized system to be made clear by studying the behavior of fish school.
